name: Design Annotation Assets
description:
Figma components to help annotate your designs. Great for communicating with product managers, developers, and fellow designers.


Includes:

  • Headers
  • Status badges
  • Blocks and brackets
  • Spacers
  • Arrows


Stay organized and happy!


--


Made by Lawrence Chang, with ideas remixed from wandi and Luis Ouriach

v1.0 - Last updated March 25, 2022
